Interface PetService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PetServiceImpl
public interface PetService
Service interface for managing pet-related business logic in the Pet Clinic system.

Provides methods for CRUD operations and retrieval of pets by user.

See more in: ServiceOverview

Since:
1.0
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getAllPets

      List<PetDTO> getAllPets()
      Retrieves all pets.
      Returns:
      List of all PetDTOs.

    • getPetById

      PetDTO getPetById(Long id)
      Retrieves a pet by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the pet to retrieve.
      Returns:
      PetDTO representing the pet with the specified ID.

    • getPetsByUserId

      List<PetDTO> getPetsByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves all pets owned by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to get pets for.
      Returns:
      List of PetDTOs representing the user's pets.

    • addPet

      PetDTO addPet(PetDTO petDTO)
      Adds a new pet.
      Parameters:
      petDTO - The pet data to add.
      Returns:
      The added PetDTO.

    • updatePet

      PetDTO updatePet(Long id, PetDTO petDTO)
      Updates an existing pet by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the pet to update.
      petDTO - The updated pet data.
      Returns:
      Updated PetDTO.

    • deletePet

      PetDTO deletePet(Long id)
      Deletes a pet by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the pet to delete.
      Returns:
      The deleted PetDTO.

    • getMyPet

      List<PetDTO> getMyPet()
      Retrieves the currently logged-in user's pets.
      Returns:
      List of PetDTOs representing the user's pets.
